Nightlight::

Nightlignth laughted too and with a smile said "I haven't to say  a 
lot about my past" and she added "When I woke up, my pod was here in 
medic bay; Blackfang and Kenzo were there and they was fixing my pod, 
it seems that I've receive dammage 'cause I couldn't speak very well 
and I have to use the cr. Blackfang told me that I could be member of 
PRimal's crew 'cause he found my pod covered with plants and I could 
see the maximal signalin my pod an in his chest. He told me about the 
beast wars, brief history of the GReat War and his point of veiw 
about Predacons. That's my small biography"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> He chuckled at her comment. He then looks the Galley with a fake 
angry face.
> 
> Rodimus Prime(Jokeing): Thank the lady. I will not get you tonight, 
but one of these days...
> 
> He shakes his finger towards the Galley while saying this. He now 
turns back to Nightlight. He hoped that he would get her to laugh.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: So Kup told you a good bit of my history today, how 
about we talk about your past?
